notesStmt.note: Signatures: Pts. 1-4, 6: [blank]² B-D⁴, E²; pt. 5: [blank]², B⁴, C².
Parts: cantus, altus, tenor, quintus, sextus, and bassus.
Reproduction of originals in: Folger Shakespeare Library (560:2-3, altus, sextus) and Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
